subject: Re: Order #SSN1704 confirmed

conversations.body_text: Hi Ben, I noticed that your order includes both the ProX Ultra and the VAM Pro motor. I’ll confirm with our operations team today. The pedals should have already been shipped, but the tracking number may not have been uploaded yet. Due to a delay, the VAM Pro motor will be shipped separately. Please see the detailed information below:      I noticed that your order includes both the ProX Ultra and the VAM Pro motor. I’ll confirm with our operations team today. The pedals should have already been shipped, but the tracking number may not have been uploaded yet. Due to a delay, the VAM Pro motor will be shipped separately. Please see the detailed information below:

Thanks for the information. However i see no detailed information, just
another copy of the text u already sent.

Op za 14 jun 2025 om 03:48 schreef service@simsonn.com

Hi Ben,  Your pedal shipped but was returned for unknown reasons, we will resend it for you tomorrow using UPS Express for you and expect it to arrive for you on the 20th. Your VAM Pro motor will also be dispatched for you in the next couple of days, we've started shipping it today!

Thanks alot for this update!
Looking forward to it.

Op ma 16 jun 2025 om 13:19 schreef service@simsonn.com

Last question.
Will i receive track and trace for both packages?
I have no track and trace at all right now so no idea when i can expect the
delivery guys at my door

Op ma 16 jun 2025 om 13:29 schreef Ben <benoliemeulen@gmail.com>

> Thanks alot for this update!
> Looking forward to it.
>
> Op ma 16 jun 2025 om 13:19 schreef service@simsonn.com <
> service@simsonn.com>
>
>> Hi Ben,
>>
>> Your pedal shipped but was returned for unknown reasons, we will resend
>> it for you tomorrow using UPS Express for you and expect it to arrive for
>> you on the 20th. Your VAM Pro motor will also be dispatched for you in the
>> next couple of days, we've started shipping it today!
>>
>>
Hi Ben,     Both of your packages have been shipped, please be on the lookout for a shipping notification to be sent to you, and I'm sorry for the trouble!

All good man! Thanks for the clear communication. Looking forward to using
the products!

Op do 19 jun 2025 om 13:32 schreef service@simsonn.com

Sorry to bother you again but the package for the VAM PRO seems to be stuck
somewhere and there are no updates in tracking for some time.
Do you know where it is?

I received the pedals and they are great

Op do 19 jun 2025 om 13:34 schreef Ben <benoliemeulen@gmail.com>

> All good man! Thanks for the clear communication. Looking forward to using
> the products!
>
> Op do 19 jun 2025 om 13:32 schreef service@simsonn.com <
> service@simsonn.com>
>
>> Hi Ben,
>>
>>
>> Both of your packages have been shipped, please be on the lookout for a
>> shipping notification to be sent to you, and I'm sorry for the trouble!
>>
>>

Hi Ben,    We are very sorry, your parcel was returned due to an error by the logistics provider, we have resent it for you and it is expected to arrive around the 2nd . Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2517500707609161
